name: Cambon Chair - Costes x Liaigre Capsule Collection
description: Part of the Costes x Liaigre Capsule Collection. Installed around the dining tables in the hotel suites, this chair combines simple lines with an elegant mix of noble materials: brushed stained blackened ash for the frame, woven straw for the backrest, and leather upholstery for the seat. Modern and spirited, this chair reinterprets the codes of classicism.
